Name: Talisman of Life
Description: Powerful totem that fortifies the wearer's life force.

Name: Girdle of Pain
Description: A treacherous belt that generates Mana by feeding on its wearer.

Name: Ring of Might
Description: A potent ring that strengthens the wearer's sword arm.

Name: Ring of Regeneration
Description: A ring of power that gradually heals the wearer.

Name: Leather Cuirass
Description: Tough studded leather armor that protects the wearer from physical blows.

Name: Dragon Mail
Description: Made from dragon scales that deflect magic and physical damage.

Name: Vermilion Plate
Description: Legendary suit of antique armor that fortifies the wearer against poison.

Name: Steel-Toe Boots
Description: Sturdy boots with a steel-capped toe, perfect for kicking butt.

Name: Boots of the March
Description: Boots that quicken the wearer's pace and boost their health.

Name: Slippers of Swiftness
Description: Red-hot booties that let the wearer run like the wind.

Name: Boots of Quantum Stride
Description: Pan-dimensional footwear that warps you across the battlefield in style.

Name: Iron Cap
Description: Sturdy metal helmet that keeps the wearer's skull intact.

Name: Helm of Many Eyes
Description: A sinister chapeau that lets its wearer see the invisible.

Name: Vermilion Helm
Description: Legendary crested helm that deflects both magical and physical damage.

Name: Helm of the Valkyrie
Description: Winged helmet that protects the wearer from magical attacks.

Name: Wooden Shield
Description: A stout wooden shield that fends off physical blows.

Name: Magic Buckler
Description: An enchanted shield that deflects magic attacks.

Name: Scarlet Shield
Description: Legendary shield from the ancient forges of the Vermilion Foundry.

Name: Valkyrie Shield
Description: A heavy shield that trades speed for protection.

Name: Glyph of Fatigue
Description: Slows down enemies who set foot in its circle.

Name: Artillery
Description: Fires a barrage of heavy artillery rounds at the enemy.

Name: Bear Trap
Description: Snaps a single enemy in its jaws when stepped on.

Name: Big Bomb
Description: Plant a big bomb that lights its fuse when an enemy nears it.

Name: Bladestorm
Description: Call down a deadly deluge of blades.

Name: Electric Cascade
Description: A vicious stream of electricity that jumps from foe to foe.

Name: Clarion Call
Description: Summon a trio of troops to fight at your side.

Name: Space Beam
Description: Does major damage against the strongest enemies on the battlefield.

Name: Red Dragon
Description: Scorch your enemies with a firebreathing Dragon that deals massive area damage.

Name: Black Dragon
Description: Scorch enemies with armor-penetrating dragon fire.

Name: Green Dragon
Description: Summon a plague dragon that breathes poisonous dragon fire.

Name: Elven Rangers
Description: Deploy a squad to deal with any threat.

Name: Armageddon
Description: Blanket the battlefield in a cleansing rain of destruction.

Name: Flare
Description: A blazing torch that exposes all invisible units within its range.

Name: Freeze
Description: Snap-freeze enemies in a giant block of ice.

Name: Frost Storm
Description: Freezes all enemies for a short while.

Name: Guardian of Time
Description: Raise a stone guardian that teleports enemies backward.

Name: Healing Spring
Description: Place a soothing shrine that heals nearby Heroes.

Name: Hungry Teeth
Description: A set of vicious jaws trained to aim at the biggest foe in the vicinity.

Name: Lava Floor
Description: Set the ground on fire and burn all enemies who are dumb enough to try to cross it.

Name: Lightning Goose
Description: Summon a Lightning Goose to fight at your side.

Name: Wrath of Zeus
Description: Darken the entire battlefield with the fury of the thunder god to strike multiple enemies.

Name: Egg of Mana
Description: Conjure up Mana from thin air.

Name: Meteor Strike
Description: Slam a meteor into a pile of enemies.

Name: Shrink Curse
Description: Downsize your enemies to have them receive more damage.

Name: Pumpkin Bomb
Description: Explodes when enemies get too close.

Name: Rally
Description: Teleport your Heroes right where you need them, and grant them a burst of courage.

Name: Sky Fist
Description: Swat enemies like they were flies with a mighty fist from the skies.

Name: Spider Mine
Description: Erupts in a cloud of poison when stepped on.

Name: Thunder Moose
Description: Summon a surly Thunder Moose to fight at your side.

Name: Thunderstorm
Description: Call in a thunderstorm that rains bolts of lightning down on your enemies.

Name: Totem of Might
Description: Plant a tribal totem that makes nearby Heroes hit harder.

Name: Plague Ward
Description: Plant a poison ward that infects any enemy passing by.

Name: Warcry
Description: Summon 7 warriors to fight at your side.

Name: Steel Sword
Description: A trusty infantry sword, quick and stabby.

Name: Crystalline
Description: A sword carved from a shard of crystal that crackles with magic energy.

Name: Heroic Halberd
Description: A heavy-hitting halberd with a ponderous swing.

Name: Staff of Dawn
Description: A staff that smites enemies with bursts of magical light.

Name: Salamander's Sting
Description: A white-hot magical blade.

Name: Crimson Talwar
Description: A towering scarlet scimitar forged in the cold fires of the Vermilion Foundry.

Name: Fangblade
Description: A vicious cutlass that drips with venom.

Name: Aquarium Tower
Description: Targets random enemies with high-impact blowfishes.

Name: Archer Tower
Description: Fast-firing archer that rains arrows upon your enemies' heads.

Name: Bolas Tower
Description: Stuns enemies.

Name: Crossbow Tower
Description: Unleashes volleys of explosive bolts at your foes.

Name: Tech Tower
Description: An electrical specialist with a far-reaching chain of lightning to zap an unlucky foe nearby.

Name: Illuminator Tower
Description: Reveals hidden units and blasts them with eldritch light.

Name: Javelin Tower
Description: Throws javelins at enemies that do great damage.

Name: Kiriko Tower
Description: Sinister tower to end enemies lives with poison area damage.

Name: Lightning Tower
Description: Zaps foes with lightning bolts that penetrate armor.

Name: Longbow Tower
Description: Remarkably long shooting range while sacrificing close combat abilities.

Name: Dart Tower
Description: Throws magical darts at enemies that extract extra mana.

Name: Mana Tower
Description: Generates extra Mana to boost your battle power.

Name: Gatling Tower
Description: Riddle your enemies with explosive shells.

Name: Moonlight Tower
Description: Shines a devastating beam of light to the strongest enemy in range, damaging close-by units as well.

Name: Mortar Tower
Description: Heavy artillery with a wide blast area.

Name: Necromancer Tower
Description: Raises skeletons from killed enemies to fight for you.

Name: Prism of the Sun
Description: Burns the strongest enemy in range with a devastating beam of light.

Name: Holy Tower
Description: Smites the Undead with divine light; 0.5x damage against all other enemies.

Name: Pinoko Tower
Description: Reliable single-target tower to hit enemies without fail.

Name: Pirate Tower
Description: Lobs bombs that deal area damage.

Name: Poison Tower
Description: A witch who throws flasks of toxic brew upon the enemy.

Name: Storm Tower
Description: Fries multiple enemies with cascades of supercharged plasma.

Name: Rocket Tower
Description: Long range tower with explosive fireworks ammunition.

Name: Scout Tower
Description: Focuses on one enemy and increases damage for every hit against that target.

Name: Shotgun Tower
Description: Close combat tower that prioritises enemies with high health.

Name: Slowdown Tower
Description: Slows enemy units to a crawl.

Name: Sniper Tower
Description: Long-range marksman whose shot is deadly but slow to reload.

Name: Snowball Tower
Description: Cheap and cheerful, their snowballs pack a wallop.

Name: Lazy Tower
Description: Slows down groups of enemies.

Name: Venom Tower
Description: Unable to strike enemies nearby but the ones further away are susceptible to his poison attacks.

Name: Volcano Tower
Description: Spews balls of molten rock at random enemies.

Name: Well of Souls
Description: Grows in power as it swallows the souls of its victims.

Name: Ace
Description: A dastardly card-sharp who steals Mana from her victims.

Name: Behemoth
Description: A lumbering beast who can shake off even the most grievous wounds.

Name: Black Jack
Description: Dexterous doctor who's a skillful fighter with his scalpel and able to regenerate mana.

Name: Blink
Description: A nimble ninja who can slip across the battlefield in the blink of an eye.

Name: Cindara
Description: A wicked fireball throwing witch.

Name: Cobra
Description: Adventurer, man's man, and snake-tamer extraordinaire.

Name: Drake
Description: Haughty warrior-prince of the draconic Order of the Spear.

Name: Dundee
Description: A nimble crocodile-hunter who shrugs off poison.

Name: Frostbeard
Description: An ancient giant of tremendous power.

Name: Furnace
Description: Born in the magma cauldrons of the deep and filled with fiery vengeance.

Name: Haunt
Description: A relentless undead warrior who's highly resistant to Magic.

Name: Holly
Description: A holy cleric who uses her powers to heal nearby Heroes.

Name: Oracle
Description: A powerful seer who conjures spirits from beyond and reveals what is hidden.

Name: iRon
Description: A robotic rust-bucket who's born to roll. Packs a mighty mortar.

Name: Knuckle
Description: A thrilla and a chilla - this big bruiser lets his icy fists do the talking.

Name: Sapphira
Description: Fragile in close combat but a deadly shot with a bow.

Name: Oni
Description: A menacing samurai who's fearsome in a melee.

Name: Ruby
Description: Wields a mighty hammer to cause damage even to the nearby enemies of the initial target.

Name: Shelly
Description: A crack shot with a rifle - she's the one granny you don't wanna cross.

Name: Centurion
Description: A fearless knight encased in armor from head to toe.

Name: Wolfric
Description: A mystic shaman who mauls his enemies with Magical spirit animals.

Name: Umbra
Description: Wields venomous blades and is highly resistant to Poison.

Name: Valorius
Description: A mighty paladin who boosts the damage of nearby allies.
